eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A REQUIRED WEEKLY TEST FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Chambers, TX; AT 06:01 AM ON OCT 08, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 06:01 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: WHO: Chambers County Emergency Management to all within Chambers County... WHAT: A test of the Emergency Alert System... WHEN: Now... WHERE: Chambers County, Texas... WHY: To test the ability to deliver emergency alerts to your device... INFO: For more information on emergency preparedness in Chambers County, visit www.chamberscountytx.gov/OEM... No action is required in response to this TEST. In the event of an actual emergency, further instructions would follow.
